text: Mërgim Vojvoda (born 1 February 1995) is a Kosovan professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Italian club Torino and the Kosovo national team. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Vojvoda is a product of youth team systems of the different Belgian and Dutch sides such as JS Pierreuse, CSJ Grivegnée and MVV Maastricht. In 2011 at the age of 16, he joined with youth team of Standard Liège.He has to do nothing with Juan Pablo Vojvoda Rizzo (born 13 May 1975) is an Argentine retired footballer who played as a central defender, and is the manager of Unión La Calera. ====Loan at Sint-Truiden==== On 20 August 2014, Vojvoda joined Belgian Second Division side Sint-Truidense, on a season- long loan. On 8 November 2014, he made his debut in a 0–1 away win against Roeselare after coming on as a substitute at 63rd minute in place of Pierre- Baptiste Baherlé. ====Loan at Carl Zeiss Jena==== On 22 June 2015, Vojvoda joined Regionalliga Nordost side Carl Zeiss Jena, on a season-long loan. One month later, he made his debut in a 0–3 away win against VfB Auerbach after coming on as a substitute at 73rd minute in place of Sören Eismann. ===Mouscron=== On 25 June 2016, Vojvoda joined Belgian First Division A side Mouscron. As part of the deal, Standard Liège secured a sell-on clause guaranteeing them 25% of the profits of a future transfer. On 30 July 2016, he made his debut as a professional footballer in a 1–2 home defeat against Anderlecht after being named in the starting line-up. ===Return to Standard Liège=== On 27 May 2019, Vojvoda signed a three-year contract with Belgian First Division A club Standard Liège and receiving squad number 27. Two years later, he made his debut in a 0–2 away win against Cercle Brugge after being named in the starting line-up. ===Torino=== On 26 August 2020, Vojvoda joined Serie A side Torino and receiving squad number 27. Torino reportedly paid a €5.5 million transfer fee. One day later, the club confirmed that he had signed on a four-year contract. ==International career== ===Albania=== ====Under-21==== He expressed his desire to play for Albania at international level.Zyrtare, Mërgim Vojvoda do luajë për kuqezinjtë Panorama Sport "Në moshë të re kam qenë pjesë e Belgjikës, mirëpo dëshira ime ka qenë që të luaj për Kombëtaren shqiptare në mënyrë që ta përfaqësoj flamurin dhe shtetin shqiptar, ka thënë Mërgim Vojvoda për kosovaren "Arena". He was invited for the first time by the Albania national under-21 football team coach Skënder Gega for the Friendly match on 6 August 2014 against Qatar in Scotland,Miqësorja, U-21: Gega fton Mërgim Vojvodën Panorama Sport but didn't appeared due to visa problem.Zyrtare: Mërgim Vojvoda luan për Shqipërinë aSport.al "Ky i fundit ishte ftuar nga trajneri Skënder Gega edhe në muajin gusht për ndeshjen miqësore me Katarin. "Jam ftuar edhe në gusht, por për shkak të problemit me vizën, nuk kam mundur që të shkoj në atë kohë. Federata më ka kuptuar", shtoi ai" In October 2014, he was included in the list of players which called up by national coach Skënder Gega for the friendly match against Romania U21 on 8 October.Miqësorja me Rumaninë, Gega publikon listën e U-21 In the match against Romania U21, Vojvoda played as a starter and the match finished in the 3–1 loss.Shpresat munden në Rumani, dështon "armata" e Gegës Vojvoda was again called up to Albania U21, this time to participate in the international friendly tournament in Dubai, United Arab Emirates on 12–18 November 2014.Shpresat, turne miqesor ne Dubai FSHF.org On 27 March 2015, Vojvoda received the Albanian citizenship to be eligible for playing with Albania U21 in competitive tournaments."Edhe një futbollist nga Kosova bëhet me pasaportë të Shqipërisë", Gazeta Olle =====2017 UEFA European Under-21 Championship===== Vojvoda was called up for the 2017 UEFA European Under-21 Championship qualification opening match against Liechtenstein U21 on 28 March 2015."Shpresat nisin kualifikimet kundër Lihtenshtajnit" , aSport.al He made his competitive debut for Albania U21 against Liechtenstein U21 on 28 March 2015 playing the full 90-minutes match helping his side to win 0–2."Liechtenstein U21 vs. Albania U21", Soccerway, 28 March 2015 ===Kosovo=== On 8 September 2016, Vojvoda decided to leave the Albania U21 in order to play for Kosovo in the future. He said that he was open for them and that he was ready to accept if there is an invitation sent to him from the Football Federation of Kosovo, On 7 November 2016, he received the call-up in a match against Turkey. On 10 November 2016, FIFA gave permission for Vojvoda to play for Kosovo. \- On 11 June 2017. Vojvoda made his debut for Kosovo in a 4–1 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification loss to Turkey.https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/round=276483/match=300361570/index.html ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|OtherIncluding other competitions, such as Thuringian Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Standard Liège II |2013–14 |unknown |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |Sint-Truidense (loan) |2014–15 |Belgian Second Division |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- |Carl Zeiss Jena (loan) |2015–16 |Regionalliga Nordost |24||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0||27||0 |- |rowspan="4"|Mouscron |2016–17 |rowspan="3"|Belgian First Division A |21||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||9||1||31||1 |- |2017–18 |26||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||5||0||32||0 |- |2018–19 |29||1||2||0||colspan="2"|—||8||0||39||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !76!!1!!5!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!22!!1!!103!!2 |- |rowspan="3"|Standard Liège |2019–20 |rowspan="2"|Belgian First Division A |25||1||2||0||3||0||0||0||30||1 |- |2020–21 |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !26!!1!!2!!0!!3!!0!!0!!0!!31!!1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !130!!2!!9!!0!!3!!0!!23!!1!!165!!3 |} ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !National team!!Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Kosovo |- |2016||0||0 |- |2017||6||0 |- |2018||7||0 |- |2019||5||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total||18||1 |} ===International goals=== Scores and results table. title: Mërgim Vojvoda
